response: Okay, let's get Alex up to speed! Here's where we are: ✅ 3 members (Sarah, Mike, Alex) | ⏳ Destination, dates, and budget still needed. We're in the destination idea gathering phase, so feel free to share any places you're excited about. I'm happy to help keep things organized!
